headline: Microsoft sales changes could help it challenge Salesforce in cloud software
summary: Microsoft is now making sure that its salespeople bring up Dynamics 365 cloud software with customers. The effort could lift Microsoft's small market share.

headline: DOJ lawsuit against Google is 'almost an exact copy' of Microsoft case, says antitrust professor
summary: "This is what you get when you rely on the safest, old-fashioned theories, the ones that worked in Microsoft," antitrust professor Timothy Wu said of the DOJ's case against Google.

headline: Ford unveils new self-driving test vehicle for 2022 launch
summary: Ford plans to launch its self-driving commercial business in 2022 with vehicles based on the Ford Escape Hybrid crossover, the company announced Tuesday.
